title: Stage Lv6-P3-S20
description: Level 6 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: If I were you, I would have done the same.
I shouldn't have trusted him, if I'm honest.
learning_points: Level 6 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: If I were you, I would have done the same.

sentences.kr: 솔직히 말하면 그를 믿지 말았어야 했어요.
sentences.en: I shouldn't have trusted him, if I'm honest.

sentences.kr: 더 신중했다면 그런 실수를 하지 않았을 것입니다.
sentences.en: If we had been more careful, we wouldn't have made that error.

sentences.kr: 당신 상황이었다면 저도 같은 선택을 했을 것입니다.
sentences.en: If I were in your position, I would have made the same choice.

sentences.kr: 더 경험이 있었다면 그런 위험을 피했을 텐데요.
sentences.en: If I had been more experienced, I would have avoided that risk.

sentences.kr: 시장 상황을 더 잘 알았다면 투자하지 않았을 것입니다.
sentences.en: If we had known the market conditions better, we wouldn't have invested.

sentences.kr: 팀장 입장이었다면 다른 결정을 내렸을 수도 있습니다.
sentences.en: If I were the team leader, I might have made a different decision.

sentences.kr: 더 많은 정보가 있었다면 그 계약에 서명하지 않았을 것입니다.
sentences.en: If we had had more information, we wouldn't have signed that contract.
